tool_description: Applies bias correction, statistical downscaling, and calibration to raw numerical weather model output to improve forecast accuracy.

raw_forecast_data.description: Raw forecast values from numerical model

variable_type.description: Weather variable being processed: temperature, precipitation, wind, pressure, humidity

bias_correction.description: Apply bias correction based on historical errors

downscaling_method.description: Statistical downscaling approach: linear, quantile_mapping, neural_network

error_messages: Data length mismatch: raw_forecast_data and forecast_times arrays must have the same length.
Invalid variable type: Use one of [temperature, precipitation, wind, pressure, humidity].
Invalid downscaling method: Use one of [linear, quantile_mapping, neural_network].
Insufficient data: Need at least 1 data point for processing.
Processing failed: Post-processing could not be completed. Check input data quality and parameters.
usage: Provide raw forecast data with corresponding times and specify the variable type. Optionally enable bias_correction and choose a downscaling_method. Returns calibrated forecast values.
